attributes.action: I would like Jacob William Rees-Mogg to be interviewed by James O'Brien.
attributes.additional_details: Much of Jacob William Rees-Mogg talk seems to be me, an averge guy soundbites, with no real depth IE we will be fine on WTO rules etc.  I feel that an interview with James O'Brien the Lbc Presenter would really help the genral public get a overal detailed picture of Brexit.
attributes.background: It seems to me that Jacob Rees-Mogg does not have to justify his answers when he is interviewd. I would like the fact based presenter James O'Brien to interview him.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
